titles.title: No Bailouts for Illegal Aliens Act
No Bailouts for Illegal Aliens Act
A bill to withhold funding authorized under the CARES Act from any State or municipality that provides economic stimulus payments through a program designed to exclusively assist illegal aliens.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary:
No Bailouts for Illegal Aliens Act
This bill withholds funding authorized under the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act) from any state or municipality that provides relief payments through a program targeted exclusively to individuals who are believed to be unlawfully present in the United States.
